title: Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE)
description:
Bug 2694 - Editor Selection Dialog: UI suggestions (1GI6RPE).

Press 'Add' for the associated editors.

Suggestions:
a. Enable multiple selection.
b. The default entry in the associated editors list could be marked as '(default)' (similar to perspectives).

Additional notes from user KLM:
f. The dialog needs a width hint.
g. The File editors Preference page grows in height when selected, but no other pages do the same.

Fix status:
KLM (10/10/2001 5:58:58 PM) - Released fixes for 'a', 'c', 'f', 'g'.
OB: No selection made, but OK button is still enabled.
EB:
When 'Add' is pressed, it should not add a hidden entry.

Entries that already exist in the associated editors should not be available for selection.
